attributes.action: Reduce tax temporarily ahead of budget and winter
attributes.additional_details: With the cost of living getting higher, inflation going up,we urge the Chancellor ahead of the budget to reduce income tax for low earners and VAT to cope with the ongoing financial difficulty being faced at every corner and family in the country, if this is done for 12 months to 2 years, it will help us get through this challenge God willing
attributes.background: Reduce tax for low earners maybe £35,000 orders and reduce  VAT for at least 12 months

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly how much you would like the Government or Parliament to reduce VAT and taxes, as well as the scope of this action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
